title: Sermons of Iohn Caluin, vpon the songe that Ezechias made after he had bene sicke and afflicted by the hand of God, conteyned in the 38. chapiter of Esay. Translated out of Frenche into Englishe. 1560.
author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
publicationStmtPublisher: by Iohn Day. And are there to be solde at his shoppe vnder the gate,
